value.title: 6 things you should always do in Power Query
value.excerpt: In today's video I will show you six things you should always do in Power Query. value.title: 8 common column headers transformations you will need in Power Query
value.excerpt: In todays video, I will show you 8 common column header transformations that you will probably need to do in Power Query. Looking for a specific one? value.title: Avoid filtering issues in Power Query
value.excerpt: Sometimes when you are filtering columns,  Power Query will create a filtering query that was probably not what you expected and it will either break your queries, or it will filter out values you want.  Let me show you!  Here you can download all the pbix files: https://curbal.com/donwload-center
